en:
Hi, more than %s unsuccessful login attempts were made by this ip address %s with your account name.
As security measure, we have locked your account access from this ip.

If you are aware of this unsuccessful login and you want to rehabilitate the access from this ip click %s.
If you are not aware of this unsuccessful login, you can ignore this message and if you need to rehabilitate it in the future contact your system adminitrator.

Regards,
VTECRM Team
bg:
Hi, more than %s unsuccessful login attempts were made by this ip address %s with your account name.
As security measure, we have locked your account access from this ip.

If you are aware of this unsuccessful login and you want to rehabilitate the access from this ip click %s.
If you are not aware of this unsuccessful login, you can ignore this message and if you need to rehabilitate it in the future contact your system adminitrator.

Regards,
VTECRM Team

en:
Hi, unsuccessful login attempts were made from more than %s hours on an Active Sync device by this ip address %s with your account name.
As security measure, we have locked your account access from this ip.

If you are aware of this unsuccessful login and you want to rehabilitate the access from this ip click %s.
If you are not aware of this unsuccessful login, you can ignore this message and if you need to rehabilitate it in the future contact your system adminitrator.

Regards,
VTECRM Team
bg:
Hi, unsuccessful login attempts were made from more than %s hours on an Active Sync device by this ip address %s with your account name.
As security measure, we have locked your account access from this ip.

en: Create a summary in the report
passed in this activity from the
will have to perform the action:
bg: Ще трябва да се извърши действието:

en: Shows cumulative opportunity amounts by selected sales stages for selected users where the expected closed date is within the specificed date range.
bg: Показва натрупаните суми възможността, до избрани етапи на продажбите за избрани потребители, при които се очаква затворен датата е в рамките на период от време. specificed

en: Shows cumulative opportunity amounts by month by outcome for selected users where the expected closed date is within the specificed date range.  Outcome is based on whether the sales stage is Closed Won, Closed Lost or any other value.
bg: Показва кумулативни възможност възлиза от месец от изход за избрани потребители, когато очакваната затворена датата е в рамките на specificed период от време. резултат се основава на това дали етапа на продажбите е приключена спечелена, затворена изгубени или друга стойност.
Всички възможности, като източник на олово

en: Shows the cumulative amounts of opportunities per lead source of selected users.
bg: Показва натрупаните суми на възможностите на олово източник на избрани потребители.

en: All Opportunities By Lead Source and Outcome
bg: Всички възможности, като източник на олово и резултат

en: Shows cumulative opportunity amounts by selected lead source by outcome for selected users where the expected closed date is within the specificed date range.  Outcome is based on whether the sales stage is Closed Won, Closed Lost or any other value.
bg: Показва натрупаните суми възможността, до избрания източник на олово с изход за избрани потребители, когато очакваната затворена датата е в рамките на период от време. specificed резултат се основава на това дали етапа на продажбите е приключена спечелена, затворена изгубени или друга стойност.

en: Shows cumulative amounts by selected sales stages for your opportunities where the expected closed date is within the specificed date range.
bg: Показва натрупаните суми по избрани етапи на продажбите за възможностите си, когато се очаква затворен датата е в рамките на период от време. specificed

en: The CRM system allows you to make a backup of the database to your FTP server. The CRM will take backup of all data whenever an admin user logs out. bg: The CRM system allows you to make a backup of the database to your FTP server. The CRM will take backup of all data whenever an admin user logs out. en:
Can be NULL (for anonymous login)
Username in this format
1) username@Canonical name of domain object Examples:user@domain
2) Domain Name\username Examples:domain\user
Important: "username" follows the Login Attribute!

en: To improve the VTE application, we collect a minimum of information from your installation. E.g. the email of the user that activates the system, the folder it has been installed in and the number of users. This is the same information needed to activate the application. We do not collect (information on ) your data, or the mail server you use. It helps us to understand how many people are enjoying VTE worldwide. The information is only updated when the administrator logs in.
bg: To improve the VTE application, we collect a minimum of information from your installation. E.g. the email of the user that activates the system, the folder it has been installed in and the number of users. This is the same information needed to activate the application. We do not collect (information on ) your data, or the mail server you use. It helps us to understand how many people are enjoying VTE worldwide. The information is only updated when the administrator logs in.
